To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private ArmsIndex _trin;

// In Initialize()
var symbols = new[] {AddEquity("SPY").Symbol, AddEquity("QQQ").Symbol};
_trin = TRIN(symbols);

// In OnData()
if (_trin.IsReady)
{
    var aDRatio = _trin.ADRatio.Value;
    var aDVRatio = _trin.ADVRatio.Value;
    var current = _trin.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbols = [self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol, self.AddEquity("QQQ").Symbol]
self.trin = self.TRIN(symbols)

# In OnData()
if self.trin.IsReady:
    a_d_ratio = self.trin.ADRatio.Value
    a_d_v_ratio = self.trin.ADVRatio.Value
    current = self.trin.Current.Value
